fixes.name: Área
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR area = 'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Seleccione el área correspondiente a su formación de pregrado dentro de la Facultad de Educación:]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    area = "Artes Plásticas", area,
    area = "Comunucación Social y Periodismo", area,
    area = "Física", "Matemáticas y Física",
    area = "No aplica", "",
    area = area, area,
    area = "Nulo", "",
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSEIF chain to a DAX expression using a VAR for the referenced column and SWITCH(TRUE()) to preserve the sequential conditional logic. All column references were transformed to 'Table'[Column] format and string literals use double quotes. This is implemented as a calculated column because the logic is row-level and uses only the current row's field.
